entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
